item.title: Beware of Unverified TLS Certificates in PHP & Python
item.description: TLS certificate verification when using third-party APIs.

item.title: Calculating day of week and Easter date
item.description: A branchless code for calculating day of week, Easter date, and Jewish holidays.

item.title: Using DAWG for predictive text input
item.description: How to find words by their prefix, which can be mistyped, and sort them by frequency stored with the word.

item.title: Recommended books and sites
item.description: IntelÂ® Architecture Instruction Set Extensions Programming Reference (PDF reference). The description of new instructions in the upcoming Haswell processor, including transactional memory support, hardware random number generator, and 256-bit vector integer operations. The transactional memory instructions should be useful for GIL (global interpreter lock) in Python and Ruby. They tried to eliminate it with software TM, but it was too slow.
